description.brief: Routes TwistArray message into Twist messages on separate topics.

package.description: The dcsl_swarm_director package contains the dcsl_swarm_director node that subscribes to the cmd_vel_array topic with TwistArray messages and publishes cmd_velX topics with Twist messages where X is the array index from the TwistArray. It is designed for use with multi-agent systems.
package.author: Brendan Andrade
